entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:46 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 06:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: W 32 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
